Name: Blessed Be the Moon
Description:
As the preparation for the Moonlit Fair is nearly complete, the whole venue exudes a vibe of joy. At this point, Jinhsi, the much anticipated Magistrate of Jinzhou shows up...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
As the preparation for the Moonlit Fair is nearly complete, the whole venue exudes a vibe of joy. At this point, Jinhsi, the much anticipated Magistrate of Jinzhou shows up...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How'd you like it, ma'am?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dewvetch's nectar is sweet and delicious, truly the highlight of this sweet porridge.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I recall there is a method to enhance the sweetness even more. Something like… soaking it in sugar water first…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh? {PlayerName}, what a pleasant surprise. Are you here for the Moonlit Fair?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Jinhsi, I didn't know you had a sweet tooth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, Uncle Li is having people taste-test some pastries. I happened to be passing by and decided to stop in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Actually, I came to see if I could help with something, but Uncle Li told me that…

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My bakery is all set for this Moonlit Fair sales. Everything's been going smoothly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I'm not sure if people will dig our new pastries, so I'm having them taste and give feedback.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, have a taste, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, thanks for your advice. I'll adjust it based on your suggestions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is merely our personal preference. It may be helpful to get others' input as well, Uncle Li.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, don't worry. I take every single customer feedback seriously. That's how I get the inspirations for new flavors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, take these snacks and enjoy them while you explore the fair. It'll be lovely to walk under the moonlight and snack on something delicious, don't you think?

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come grab a bite if you get tired and hungry anytime. You'll enjoy the fair more on a full stomach!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Uncle Li. If you need any assistance, please let me know. I'll be sure to help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great, I'll keep that in mind. Thanks, Madam Magistrate! Now go and have fun!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, how has the Moonlit Fair been for you? I just found some time to come over and take a look, and I ran into you right away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since it's such a delightful coincidence, how about we take a stroll together from here on?

Dialogues.Speaker: Envious Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, it looks amazing! Where did you get it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Smug Child
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yumyum Haven. Uncle Li made it fresh! Madam Magistrate said it's good too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Magistrate? Is Jinhsi here, too? I should give Yumyum Haven a visit...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What else… Lemme think… I can't let the riddle updates fall behind…

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, Madam Magistrate! Are you here to solve riddles or perhaps share some new ones?

Options.PlotLineKey: You came up with the riddles?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. When I was reviewing the stall applications earlier, I noticed a lantern riddles stall. I remembered a couple riddles I had solved before, so I wrote them down.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I'm not sure if they were selected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those riddles you provided are just perfect! They're so simple and clever. I've put them all up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Unfortunately, no one has solved them to claim the special gift you prepared yet.

Options.PlotLineKey: A special gift from Jinhsi? I wanna try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sure! Now, the first riddle is... Oh, why don't we let Madam Magistrate tell you herself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright. Here's a riddle… "What finds joy in making others smile with glittering lights, even at its own cost?"

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe… I knew it would be easy for you to solve. Guess my special gift has finally found its owner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Jinhsi blinks in astonishment, then quickly breaks into a smile.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, you always surprise me, but unfortunately, that's not the right answer.

Options.PlotLineKey: Looks like I can't get your special gift.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you want it, I can always make another one for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are still plenty other riddles to solve. Those give various gifts too! Give them a try!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}'s going to take home all the rewards at this rate, I'm afraid.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm not that good at solving riddles.
Then I have to quit for other people's sake.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're too modest. Indeed, this event is for everyone. Others deserve a chance to win, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, indeed, this event is for everyone. Others deserve a chance to win, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, how about we check out other stalls?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mr. Xieyang, excuse us. We'll leave you to your riddle-making. May your creativity flow and your inspiration never end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you! Happy Moon-Chasing Festival to you both!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fireworks! Fireworks! Fireworks of all kinds! You can even make your own!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Madam Magistrate, wait up! See any fireworks you like? My treat, take your pick!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without your help, this stall wouldn't be set up so smoothly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, Madam Magistrate did me a big favor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I used to keep all my goods in a warehouse across the river.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You know, fireworks need special care to prevent accidents, so I tried to take fireproof and waterproof measures, did whatever I could.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When Madam Magistrate heard about it, she helped me find a better storage place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Otherwise, the quality could've suffered, and there might've been safety risks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm glad I could help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, take these fireworks as a gift! Thanks to you, these beautiful colors remain intact.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But storage's tough for this one. Any temp or humidity change can mess up the colors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. We will make sure to handle them carefully. Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're welcome! Feel free to come back for more!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so glad our hard work paid off. Seeing the Moonlit Fair's success is truly heartwarming.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I always knew we could do it, but witnessing it firsthand is truly touching.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then let's spend some more time here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've already had the most out of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I walked around, I saw genuine smiles on the visitors' faces, and the vendors were passionately running their stalls.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everyone here is enjoying the fair… and this is exactly what I wished to see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, thank you for showing me around. It's been a truly joyful experience because you are here with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... have you had enough fun yet?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've made my wish come true. Now let's go do what you'd like to do.

Options.PlotLineKey: We are already doing just that, walking under the moon together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jinhsi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "May we meet under the full moon's light, our bond unbroken, ever bright."
